mapper.select: SELECT M.MEMBER_NO, M.MEMBER_ID, M.MEMBER_PW, M.MEMBER_EMAIL, M.MEMBER_NAME, M.MEMBER_NICK, M.MEMBER_TEL, M.MEMBER_ADDR, TO_CHAR(M.ENROLL_DT,'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS') AS ENROLL_DT, M.PROFILE_IMG, M.MEMBER_TYPE, M.RATE_NO, M.POINT_NO, M.POINT_PRICE, R.RATE_NAME FROM MEMBER M JOIN RATE R ON M.RATE_NO = R.RATE_NO WHERE M.MEMBER_ID = #{memberId} AND M.SECESSION_FL = 'N'
